title: Vitrify
data:
{{version031}}
{{Flavour|Renders a creature's body structure as brittle and fragile as glass, increasing the damage they take from all sources.}}

'''Vitrify''' is a monster-only spell that applies the '''Fragile''' status to a target, if the target fails a [[willpower]] check. Fragile increases all damage you take by +50%, rounded down.<!--ouch.cc--> This stacks with the modifier from [[Harm]].

For players, Fragile's duration is 8-18 turns per cast, stacking up to 50 turns. For monsters, the status lasts 8-16 turns.

{{monsters with spell}}

The following monsters don't have the Vitrify spell, but can apply the Fragile status to a target without a willpower check:
*{{monsterlink|Killer Klown}} - [[Throw Klown Pie]]
*{{monsterlink|glass eye}} - [[Vitrifying Gaze]]

==History==
*This spell was added in [[0.31]].
